mean_cn: adj.苍白的，灰白的；  vi.变苍白
mean_en: (of a person, their face, etc.) having skin that is almost white; having skin that is whiter than usual because of illness, a strong emotion, etc.; light in colour; containing a lot of white; (of light) not strong or bright
sentence: Her pale face shows that she is very sick.
sentence_trans: 我们可以从她苍白的脸色看出她病得很严重。
